## Definition of Done

- [ ] Docs updated (README / API)
- [ ] Security review
- [ ] Performance considerations addressed

- [ ] Backend:
- [ ] Frontend:
- [ ] Infra / DevOps:
- [ ] AI Prompting / Model:
